summary: 22 year-old- Yan is trying hard to find his way in life: a job he likes, an ideal. In Saint-Nazaire, his home town, he vegetates, just like his father, an unambitious worker. His fiancée, ... See full summary »
cast: Jean-Paul Giquel|Juliet Berto|Dominique Labourier|Jean-Pierre Melec|André Julien|Gilette Barbier|Christian Bouillette|Albert Dray|Michel Duplaix|Jacques Favre-Bertin|Gérard Zimmermann
title: Camarades
